org.sliderule.stats

Class Normal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sliderule.stats.Normal

  • public final class Normal
extends java.lang.Object

    Normal Distribution

    This class provides a time-efficient means for querying values and inverse values from the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of the standard normal distribution (with μ = 0 and σ = 1.0).

    See Also:
    • Wikipedia: Normal Distribution
    • DeGroot, Morris H., and Schervish, Mark J. Probability and Statistics, 3rd Ed. Toronto: Addison-Wesley, 2002. pp. 776-778. Print.

    • Method Detail

      • cdf

        public static double cdf(int n,
         double x)
        Evaluate the cumulative distribution function of the Normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        n - sample size such that there are n-1 degrees of freedom. (ignored)
        x - value of random variable X
        Returns:
        p = Pr( X <= x | n-1 )

      • inv

        public static double inv(int n,
         double p)
        Evaluate the inverse of the cumulative distribution function of the Normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        n - sample size such that there are n-1 degrees of freedom.2 <= n
        p - level of confidence. 0 <= p <= 1
        Returns:
        x ∋ Pr( X <= x | n-1 ) = p

         double u,
